ModMetaData.name: Steves Doors
ModMetaData.author: Scurvyez
ModMetaData.description:
Discord: steveo.o steam: Scurvyez
This mod adds some (9 currently) new doors to the game. Neon, semi-transparent, and glowing, mostly. One step closer to the full cyberpunk city vibe. This mod was made to pair with my other infrastructure mod, Steve's Walls.
